references.paper_title: Skeleton-aware networks for deep motion retargeting

references.paper_title: Contact preserving shape transfer: Retargeting motion from one shape to another
references.reason: This paper addresses the challenge of preserving contact during motion retargeting, directly relating to a key aspect of the presented work.
This seminal paper established many of the initial concepts in motion retargeting, providing historical context and a foundation for later improvements.
This paper, similar to the current work, aims to improve geometric accuracy and contact preservation during retargeting, allowing direct comparison of methodologies.
